title: Development of Self-Regulation and Co-Regulation Strategies in Collaborative Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in online learning environments, understanding of basic self-regulated learning strategies, and foundational knowledge of collaborative learning theories
context.additional_context: Emphasizes collaborative online learning strategies applicable to mathematics education for pre-service and in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three self-regulated learning strategies in a collaborative online environment.
Learners can enhance social presence in online learning communities by 20% or more using co-regulation strategies.
Learners can analyze the impact of self- and co-regulation on cognitive presence through formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
